Login Label Field: Please enter the survey ID or participant ID that has been assigned to you.
Back: Sign in as a study participant
Coordinator Button: Sign in as a study participant
Coordinator Login Label: If you are a research coordinator that has been assigned a username and password, enter that here.
Password Screen Label: Enter your participant password to continue.
Set Password Label: Set a password to protect your account.  Your password should be at least 6 letters or numbers long.
FaceId Label: Would you like to enable FaceID to login faster in the future?
